description: API endpoints for Access Control Webservice

post.description: Adds specified users to an access control group
post.summary: Add users to access control group

post.description: Assign a currently unassigned credential to a user
Create a credential based on a hex value and credential type. Useful if you see an unauthorized badge event, know its type and want to import it
post.summary: Create access control credential by hex value and type

post.description: Creates an access control group
Create a location access grant
Create a location access revocation
Create a rhombus secure csn credential (Rhombus Badge)
Create a standard csn credential (Third Party Badge)
Create a 64bit raw wiegand credential. Used when an explicit endpoint for the wiegand format is not otherwise defined.
Create a wiegand credential
Create a D10202 wiegand credential
Create a H10301 wiegand credential
Create a H10304 wiegand credential
Delete an access control credential. It is recommended to revoke a credential rather than delete it to preserve credential history
Delete an access control group
Deletes a location access grant
Deletes a location access revocation

Delete an unassigned access control credential. The credential must be unassigned (revoked) before this method can be called. History of the credential is maintained but it will no longer be returned as an unassigned credential.
Find all access control credentials in the org
post.summary: Find access control credentials by org

post.description: Find all access control credentials for the specified user
post.summary: Find access control credentials by user

post.description: Find all access control credentials for the specified users
post.summary: Find access control credentials by users

post.description: Retrieve the access control group with the specified name
post.summary: Find access control group by exact name

post.description: Find all access control group memberships by user
post.summary: Find access control group memberships by user

post.description: Retrieve all access control groups with a name starting with the specified prefix
post.summary: Find access control groups by name prefix

post.description: Retrieve all access control groups defined in the org
post.summary: Find access control groups by org

post.description: Find all access control groups a user belongs to
post.summary: Find access control groups by user membership

post.description: Find all users belonging to an access control group
post.summary: Find all users for access control group

post.description: Retrieves all credentials that have owned the credential hex value. Expect at most 1 valid/active credential and the rest are revoked
post.summary: Find credential history by credential hex value

post.description: Retrieves all credentials that have owned the credential value.
post.summary: Find credential history by credential value

post.description: Retrieves all credentials both current and revoked that were at some point assigned to the specified user
Finds location access grants by the specified access controlled door
post.summary: Find location access grants by access controlled door

post.description: Finds location access grants by the specified door label
post.summary: Find location access grants by door label

post.description: Finds location access grants by the specified group
post.summary: Find location access grants by group

post.description: Finds location access grants by the specified location
post.summary: Find location access grants by location

post.description: Finds location access grants by the specified location and user
post.summary: Find location access grants by location and user

post.description: Finds all location access grants in the org
post.summary: Find location access grants by org

post.description: Finds location access grants by the specified user
post.summary: Find location access grants by user

post.description: Finds location access revocations by the specified access controlled door
post.summary: Find location access revocations by access controlled door

post.description: Finds location access revocation by the specified door label
post.summary: Find location access revocations by door label

post.description: Finds location access revocations by the specified group
post.summary: Find location access revocations by group

post.description: Finds all location access revocations in the org
post.summary: Find location access revocations by org

post.description: Finds location access revocations by the specified user
post.summary: Find location access revocations by user

post.description: Retrieve a location access grant by id
Retrieve a location access revocation by id
Retrieves a rhombus secure csn credential including sensitive details
post.summary: Get Rhombus Secure CSN credential details

post.description: Retrieves a standard csn credential including sensitive details
Removes specified users from an access control group
post.summary: Remove users from access control group

post.description: Revokes an access control credential. Unlike suspension this will give up its claim on the credential value allowing another cred to claim it as its identifier
Mark an access control credential as suspended
Unlock an access controlled door
Mark an access control credential as no longer suspended
Updates an access control group's meta information like name and description
Updates a location access grant
Updates a location access revocation
Update a rhombus secure csn credential (Rhombus Badge)
Update a rhombus secure mobile credential (RhombusKey App w/ BLE or NFC)
Update a standard csn credential (Third Party Badge)
Update a wiegand credential (Third Party Badge)
